summary: Highly motivated and results-oriented web developer with a diverse skillset encompassing both front-end and back-end technologies. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, and popular libraries like React.js for building interactive and dynamic user interfaces. Possesses strong database management skills with experience in SQL and NoSQL databases (MongoDB). Well-versed in version control using Git and familiar with modern DevOps practices like MonoRepo and TurboRepo. Additionally, holds experience with WordPress development and possesses a strong foundation in data analysis, statistics, machine learning, and natural language processing (NLP). Eager to leverage this comprehensive skillset to contribute to a fast-paced and innovative development team.

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experiences.description: Specializing in developing CMS platforms. Using technologies such as TypeScript, ReactJS, NextJS, Express, MongoDB, and Redux to build scalable, client-centered solutions

activities.title: Managing a large facebook group of developers focus on ReactJs
